hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v
umask 0022
echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/ /tmp/scan-build-*
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug --verbose # --disable-unified-compilation
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Build using scan-build" scan-build-3.8 -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true -v ./mach --log-no-times build -v
echo "Retrieve the last scan-build (-o of scan-build is failing)" SCAN_BUILD_DIR=$(ls -1d /tmp/scan-build-*|tail -1) mkdir -p reports/
echo "Move it" mv $SCAN_BUILD_DIR reports/fx-scan-build
echo "Set correct permissions" chmod o+r reports/fx-scan-build/*
echo "Send it" rsync -arv -R reports/fx-scan-build/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
